title: I Don’t Want to Be Attacked by Him - Novel Updates
tags: Love Interest Falls in Love First   Male to Female   Mysterious Illness   Time Travel   Unlucky Protagonist
author: 悲殇的秋千
description: His wife who had been with him for ten years died of illness, and he also died accidentally after drinking, only to find that he had traveled to the past. He wants to save everything and he wants to find his wife ten years ago. But this is a bit different from what you imagined?>
